Name: Chocolate makes you happy 7
About the game: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, lazors and explosions. The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level. In Chocolate makes you happy 7: - 50 levels - Explosions - Jumpers - Teleports - Sweets - Accelerators - Traps - Changing gravity - Treadmills - Lazors - Colorful art - Cool Soundtrack - Achievements
